HowWework.title: How we work
HowWework.element1: We apply Scrum as a work framework. It is a work methodology agile that aims to deliver value on the product in periods short periods of time and for this it is based on three pillars: transparency,inspection and adaptation.
HowWework.element2: Our creative process is based on the Design Thinking methodology, we want understand you and solve the real problems of your users. It is an iterative process   and non-linear, in which we will generate a large number of innovative ideas to address the complex challenges of real optimization of your procedures and resources.
